name: Psychologist Valentina Artamonova
howicanhelpText: relationships: with yourself, your partner, parents, children, colleagues;
starting and ending relationships, coping with breakups;
work and money: finding your path, career questions, financial mindset;
mydirectionsText: Trauma Therapy — over 10 years of experience working with trauma.
Brainspotting — a method for processing deep emotional experiences.
Emotions — coach in understanding and managing emotions.
Sleep — somnotherapy and healthy sleep optimization.
Sexology and Sex Education — helping to talk about important topics without shame.
Financial Psychology — a course on money and inner beliefs.
aboutPsychologist: Member of associations: 'Psychologists Without Borders', 'National Psychological Association of Ukraine', 'European Federation of Psychologists Associations', 'International Association of Applied Psychology (IAAP)'.
Leading psychologist of psychological, financial, and author's games.
Volunteer in social projects, with seriously ill patients and their families, brainspottinghelp.
I work with adults. With children only in pair with an adult.

service1.description: Personalized approach to solving personal and professional problems.

service2.description: Assistance in strengthening family relationships and resolving family conflicts.

service3.description: Assistance in increasing financial status, business development, working with procrastination.

phrase1: "You are here, which means you are ready for changes in your life. And that's already halfway there. Let's walk it together..."
phrase2: "Every situation shows us something, the main thing is to understand what exactly"
phrase3: "Every day is a chance to change your life for the better"

gamesBottom.text: In the game, you can experience what you dare not in real life.
